violations.title: Food contact surfaces cleaned and sanitized
violations.narrative: Residue observed on ice baffle. Corrected by cleaning. (4-601.11)

violations.title: Contamination prevented during food prep/storage/display; employee cleanliness
violations.narrative: Apples on display not wrapped. Corrected by placing under sneeze guard. (3-306.11)

violations.title: Single-use/service articles properly stored and used
violations.narrative: Single-service items not properly dispensed to protect food/lip contact surfaces. (4-904.11)
